Articles.Content: i don\'t know were to put this but what type of coding do people use to make mods/ plugins for kerbal space program. if you know please tell thank you!!

If you browse the Add-on development forum you will be able to find out more about plug-ins, mods and developing them.

Currently, the plug-ins are written in C#.

type of coding

Remembered me of my (pseudo-)informatics teacher (he just knows nothing about computers) talking about \'computer languages\'...

It\'s PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE, hehe ;P

Remembered me of my (pseudo-)informatics teacher (he just knows nothing about computers) talking about \'computer languages\'...

It\'s PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE, hehe ;P

Yeah, people always confuse me by saying coding instead of programming because to me - as an electronic engineer interested in communications - coding refers to things like cryptography, compression, error control etc.
